attributes.action: make people who are on Job Seekers take the role of Litter Picker
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who are claiming Job Seekers allowance should be required to pick litter from their local neighbourhood. It would be in a sense a "job" and they would be earning their job seekers. They should be required to do 2-3 hours a day Monday to Friday. This would give those people a sense of responsibility which would at least prepare them for full time work.
